title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the AI-powered energy auditor system.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall architecture of the AI-powered energy auditor system, including components, data flows, integration points, scalability considerations, security measures, and deployment strategies.

title: Data Collection and Processing
description: Identify and implement methods for collecting and processing building data, such as energy consumption, occupancy, and environmental factors.

title: AI Model Development
description: Develop and train AI models for analyzing building data and identifying energy optimization opportunities.

title: User Interface Design and Development
description: Design and develop a user-friendly interface for interacting with the AI-powered energy auditor system.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement a database schema for storing building data, energy audit results, and system configurations.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures and access control mechanisms to ensure data privacy and system integrity.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans to ensure the AI-powered energy auditor system meets functional and non-functional requirements.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure and deployment pipelines for the AI-powered energy auditor system, ensuring scalability and reliability.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the AI-powered energy auditor system.
